<h2>Hi I'm <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/shyam-vyas23" target="_blank">Shyam</h2></a>

### About Me:

- I'm working as a **DevOps Engineer**
- Containerizing @cosmos
- Interested in **Cloud Native, Web3**
- Currently learning **Python, Golang, Cosmos Blockchain**
- :heart: Open Source Softwares & Tools

### Projects

- [cosmos-devops](https://github.com/shyambin/cosmos-devops)
